languageModelTools.name: slate_systemStatus
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get full SLATE system health: Python, GPU, PyTorch, Ollama, services. Returns JSON.

quick.description: Quick check (true) or full JSON output (false)

languageModelTools.name: slate_runtimeCheck
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Check SLATE runtime integrations: Python, venv, GPU, PyTorch, Transformers, Ollama.

languageModelTools.name: slate_runnerStatus
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get GitHub Actions self-hosted runner status, active runs, and configuration.

workflow.description: Workflow file to dispatch (only with action='dispatch')

languageModelTools.name: slate_hardwareInfo
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Detect GPUs, CUDA configuration, and PyTorch compatibility. Can optimize settings.

optimize.description: Apply GPU optimizations (true) or just detect (false)

languageModelTools.name: slate_orchestrator
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Manage SLATE services: start, stop, or check status of dashboard, runner, and health services.

languageModelTools.name: slate_workflow
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Manage task lifecycle, PR workflows, and stale task cleanup.

languageModelTools.name: slate_benchmark
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Run SLATE performance benchmarks.

languageModelTools.name: slate_install
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Install the full SLATE ecosystem: git repo, venv, pip deps, PyTorch (GPU-aware), Ollama, Docker, VS Code extension, SLATE models, and workspace config.

target.description: Target directory for fresh install (defaults to current workspace)

beta.description: Use BETA fork instead of main repo

languageModelTools.name: slate_update
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Update SLATE from git, refresh pip dependencies, rebuild VS Code extension, re-validate ecosystem.

languageModelTools.name: slate_checkDeps
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Check all SLATE ecosystem dependencies: Python, Git, GPU, PyTorch, Ollama, Docker, VS Code extension.

languageModelTools.name: slate_runCommand
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Run an arbitrary SLATE Python command and return the output. Use for custom operations.

languageModelTools.name: slate_forkCheck
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Check contributor forks for updates, pending integrations, and sync status. Actions: status, sync, check, list.

languageModelTools.name: slate_securityAudit
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Run security scans: ActionGuard (dangerous patterns), PII Scanner (credential leaks), SDK Source Guard (trusted publishers). Scan: full, actionguard, pii, sdk.

languageModelTools.name: slate_agentStatus
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Check agent registry, autonomous loop status, copilot runner bridge, and integrated loop. Actions: status, discover, integrated.

languageModelTools.name: slate_gpuManager
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Manage dual-GPU configuration: load balancing, model preloading, VRAM status. Actions: status, configure, preload.

languageModelTools.name: slate_autonomous
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Control the autonomous task loop: check status, discover tasks, execute a single task, or run multiple tasks. Actions: status, discover, single, run (with max parameter).

max.description: Maximum tasks to execute (only with action='run', default 5)

languageModelTools.name: slate_runProtocol
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Run the full guided SLATE protocol sequence: (1) system health, (2) runtime integrations, (3) workflow status, (4) enforce completion. Ensures all systems are 'locked in' for development.

languageModelTools.name: slate_handoff
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Hand off a task to the SLATE autonomous agent for background execution. The chat participant identifies the work, then queues it for the autonomous loop to complete.

task.description: Description of the task to hand off to the autonomous agent

languageModelTools.name: slate_startServices
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Start all SLATE services in one action: orchestrator (dashboard, runner, monitor) and copilot runner bridge for autonomous task processing.

languageModelTools.name: slate_executeWork
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Aggressive work execution pipeline: (1) cleanup stale tasks, (2) discover available work, (3) execute up to N tasks via autonomous agent, (4) verify final state. Use this to DO work, not just report on it.

max.description: Maximum number of tasks to execute (default 3)

languageModelTools.name: slate_agentBridge
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Bidirectional bridge between the @slate chat participant and the SLATE autonomous loop. Poll for tasks dispatched by the autonomous system (COPILOT_CHAT agent), complete them, check bridge status, or cleanup stale entries. This makes @slate a first-class subagent in the SLATE agent registry.

action.description: Bridge action: 'poll' (get pending tasks), 'status' (bridge health), 'complete' (mark task done), 'cleanup' (remove stale)

taskId.description: Task ID to complete (required for 'complete' action)

languageModelTools.name: slate_devCycle
languageModelTools.modelDescription: View or manage the SLATE development cycle: current stage (plan/code/test/deploy/feedback), recent activities, and stage transitions. Actions: status, transition, activities, guidance.

stage.description: Target stage for transition (only with action='transition')

languageModelTools.name: slate_specKit
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Manage SLATE specifications: list, process, AI-analyze, generate wiki docs, and extract development roadmap. Actions: status, list, process, analyze, wiki, roadmap.

specId.description: Specific spec ID to process or analyze (optional)

languageModelTools.name: slate_learningProgress
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Track learning progress, XP, achievements, and guided learning paths. Actions: status, paths, achievements, next, complete.

stepId.description: Step ID to mark complete (required for 'complete' action)

languageModelTools.name: slate_planContext
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get compressed SLATE plan context for efficient LLM usage: current dev stage, task counts, spec summaries, and code directives. Token-optimized. Scopes: full, cycle, tasks, specs, guidance.

scope.description: Context scope: 'full' (all), 'cycle' (dev stage only), 'tasks' (task counts), 'specs' (spec list), 'guidance' (code directives)

languageModelTools.name: slate_codeGuidance
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get stage-aware code guidance for a specific file or context. Returns file-type-specific best practices aligned with the current development stage.

file.description: File path to get guidance for (uses extension to determine language)

context.description: Additional context about what you're working on
